title: Alquin - Nobody Can + Best Kept Secret (1975-76) [FLAC]
description:
Alquin - Nobody Can Wait Forever and Best Kept Secret (1975-76/1990)

Genre: Dutch, Eclectic Prog, Prog Related, Brass Rock

Tracklist:

...a) Sunrise
...b) Wake me up

...a) Stranger
...b) You might as well fall

...a) Revolution's theme
...b) Nobody can wait forever

Personel:
"Nobody Can Wait Forever":
- Ferdinand Bakker / guitar, piano, backing vocals
- Michael van Dijk / lead vocals
- Dick Franssen / organ, electric piano, Moog
- Ronald Ottenhoff / alto & tenor saxes, flute

- Job Tarenskeen / drums, backing vocals (3-7)
- Paul Weststrate / drums, percussion
+ The Thunderthighs / backing vocals
"Best Kept Secret":
- Ferdinand Bakker / guitars, piano, electric violin, backing vocals
- Michel van Dijk / lead vocal
- Dick Franssen / organ, piano, Wurlitzer
- Ron Ottenhoff / saxes, flute
- Job Tarenskeen / drums, percussion, backing vocals
- Jan Visser / bass, congas, backing vocals
+ Buddy Beadle, Martin Droner, Steve Gregory, Geoff Wright / Horn section
